website_summaries.verdict: A fun party favor that your guests will love to take out at night.
pros: Set of 24 acrylic shot glasses are durable, affordable and reusable
Multi-colored lights shine brightly in the dark and turn on with a simple switch
Battery will last for 2 to 4 hours of continuous use
cons: Because of the battery, these glasses are not dishwasher safe and can not be submerged in water

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are so cool. Brought them camping and everyone thought they were hilarious. Kind of cheap quality but I mean, what do u expect when ur paying 20 bucks for almost 30 glasses. Also these aren't dishwasher safe and don't submerge them in water because it'll blow the circuit in them. They're super bright too and go through different color animating sequences. Very happy customer here. Video is of a cup straight out of the box without any use. Looks even cooler with liquid inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the shot glasses for a surprise birthday party ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the shot glasses for a surprise birthday party. They were the hit of the party. All the shot glasses were left outside in the cold weather and the next morning they were all covered with dew. I thought they were ruined so I just collected them and put them in a plastic bag. A month later I was going to have a gathering and thought I would see if they still worked. I was very doubtful. I checked all 24 and only 5 didn't work. I thought that was great.
customer_reviews.author: MaryC

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are absolutely amazing. Every single one of them worked when we ...
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are absolutely amazing. Every single one of them worked when we got them and they were a hit at our new year's party! A few even got completely submerged and still flashed brightly. If you want to conserve battery on them shut them off after every shot, they die after like 3 hours of being continuously on. Other that that 10/10 will be getting a set every party we have!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for our adult birthday parties
customer_reviews.text: These are neat little shot glasses. Great for our adult birthday parties. They are bright and vivid and work well when they work. Unfortunately, out of the 24, 3 glasses did not work. Of course, you don't find this out until the night of your party so far that reason I dropped this down to 3 stars BUT then I upped my rating back up to 4 stars because they arrived one day early which is always appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: some don't work & are broken
customer_reviews.text: I am crushed & confused...I spend way too much money on amazon for me to be receiving anything less than satisfactory! I ordered these shot glasses as a unique keepsake for my son's guest who've attend his 30th birthday party, it was somewhat embarrassing/ humiliating for quest to be returning their shot glasses in for another one because the one given didn't work... I will not be buying again as I truly planned on doing for my daughter's 25th birthday next month. it was too late to send them back we had passed them out to the guest as we were preparing for a birthday shot.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Jones

customer_reviews.title: that was the only disappointment. I might be able to change them out
customer_reviews.text: These were used for a flow in the dark wedding send off for my daughter and they were small but cute. Just as pictured. The batteries in some are already done....that was the only disappointment. I might be able to change them out...I have not been able to tell how.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda G. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Nice value! Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute idea. I'm not sure how you are supposed to wash them if you want to reuse them but it is very effective for one evening.
customer_reviews.author: A. Linss

customer_reviews.title: Great product for parties
customer_reviews.text: Great product for parties! Some of them were defective but I got 2 orders of these, definitely was fun to have at a party.
customer_reviews.author: nicole subrati

customer_reviews.title: Very cool for outside party at vodka bar
customer_reviews.text: Very cool for outside party at vodka bar! You don't need to take the bottom off to turn them on. Just press through the bottom and will start blinking... But do not clean them with the bottom on and battery bc will get ruined
customer_reviews.author: Andrea H.

customer_reviews.title: Plastic not glass
customer_reviews.text: Why my refund not going back to my credit card account
customer_reviews.author: Eula Gayle - Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Fun for parties!
customer_reviews.text: These are very fun for parties!!! The bottom of them holding the battery and LED do tend to fall quite easy but we just tighten it back up! Friends loved them! Wary of how you wash them! as water will get inside electronics. Lost LEDs to that.
customer_reviews.author: Alexi Onofre

customer_reviews.title: These are really cool, unfortunately they were not used for the event
customer_reviews.text: These are really cool, unfortunately they were not used for the event, change of plans. However, I am waiting to use them at the first opportunity. Great "take home" for guests.
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Great party favor!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my adult birthday party. They were a big hit, I let my guests keep them after they used them, they work, they're a great conversation piece, I recommend them!

customer_reviews.title: Light Up your Table With These LIght Up Cups
customer_reviews.text: When you have a glow in the dark theme party, these little light up cups look very nice when they are set up on your table. Then your guess can take them home when the party is over.

customer_reviews.title: look for ounce size

customer_reviews.title: Shots with color!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for an adult party goody bag and they were a hit. Multicolored lights gave the ordinary shot glass some edge. Lights are controlled by a button on the bottom of the glass. Lightweight and fun.

customer_reviews.title: I loved the product completely
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product completely!!! As a matter of fact, I plan on re-ordering. I suggest this product if anyone is looking to purchase. It lights up the room and the price is right. Great gifts for Christmas and New Years as well if you are having a party!!!!

customer_reviews.title: These were a fun giveaway for an event I recently hosted
customer_reviews.text: These were a fun giveaway for an event I recently hosted. The only issue is that out of the box of 24 about 6 did not light up. This was disappointing as I wanted to give all 24 away. Also 3 the bottoms fell off of 3 of them.

customer_reviews.title: Birthday bling
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my birthday party and they were a HUGE success. They were really pretty and added a fun vibe. I wasn't sure how they would hold up for the jello shots and I was scared they wouldn't light up. But there's a button on the bottom on the cups so everything worked well.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a party
customer_reviews.text: perfect for a party, perfect size, just a shot !! The colors of the light are bright. I love it. I'm gonna use them for my wedding party. The plastic of the glass is nice and clear. I just need to washt them before use them.

customer_reviews.title: Not 10 oz capacity. But still a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I thought each cup had a 10oz capacity. If it was clear that there was a 10 oz capacity of all of them put together I would have given them 5 stars. I didn't have any that didn't work. I like the way that the light and battery pop off and on the bottom. This assured me that they would still work after I poured the Jell-O shot in it The plastic was strong enough for me to drill a small hole in the side to hang it from a Mardi Gras bead. They were a hit of the party.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our Mardi Gras themed couples wedding shower. My guests loved them! Had a few that didn't work, but company was quick to replace them. Great customer service and great item!
customer_reviews.author: Cemetery Girl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a late night platter of shots at a backyard wedding.

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived intact with no obvious damage. 10 of the 24 cups weren't assembled. The bottoms had fallen off and the electronics had fallen to the bottom of the box. I assembled and tested each cup. 5 cups had electronics that didn't work at all. 3 additional cups all had at least 1 LED that was nonfunctional. I tested all of the batteries and 8 batteries were completed dead. For the quality this set is way overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: FatherD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: 19 worked fine. These are not high quality and you should ...
customer_reviews.text: Out of 24 cups, 19 worked fine. These are not high quality and you should never put them through a dish washer. The battery and LED components are positioned on the bottom and are not sealed in anyway. But it was still a bargain for the price. They made good stocking stuffers for this holiday season.

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 boxes and half of each box didn't work. I have to send it back. The stick that pulls out from the battery gets stuck and breaks so the light won't turn on. It can't be opened either, I tried to take the piece of stick out and can't . These were a party favor for my guest and now I have to take them back. So mad! I took 2 pics, out of 48 cups only 30 works! The ones in the box don't work and the plastic piece breaks in between the battery so it will not turn on!
customer_reviews.author: Devra Allmon

product_meta.title: 24PCS Flash Light Up Cups Flashing Shots Light 24 LED Bar Night Club Party Drink
feature_bullets: 🍺 LED Flash Cups: With led flash light at the bottom of the each cup, greatly help to build atmosphere at night parties, dating, or in bar.
🍺 High Quality Material: Use acrylic material instead of glass,the cups will be more strong and durable. Very convenient for kids.
🍺 24 PCS/ Set: you do not need to worry there is no enough cups when you are going to hold a party.
🍺 Easy to Clean: The material is really convenient to clean, it dries quickly after washing, so no mold worries.
🍺 Easy to Organize: Small size, which can be organized in a box. Save space in your kitchen.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars196 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
